Review content assessed as up-to-date: 29 September 2003.

The editorial group responsible for this previously published document have withdrawn it from publication.
R E A S O N F O R W I T H D R AW A L
This review is withdrawn Issue 1, 2009. The authors of this review have declined to update this further and the conclusions are not
relevant to breast cancer clinical practice
